mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (memberId, password, name, gender, role) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{role})
INSERT INTO favorCate (favorCateId, memberId, cateId) VALUES (favorCateSeq.nextVal, #{memberId}, #{cateId})
mapper.select: SELECT f.favorCateId, f.memberId, f.cateId, c.cateName FROM favorCate f INNER JOIN category c ON c.cateId = f.cateId WHERE f.memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message (title, content, sender, receiver) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{sender}, #{receiver})
